install.name: s4j New Users
install.author: Software4Joomla
install.description:
S4J New Users is a module that displays new users in Community Builder Note: Community Builder is required.
More modules from S4J can be found at www.software4joomla.com

param.name: pms_link
param.label: Private Messaging System
param.description: Choose one of the supported PM systems from the list

param.name: chat_system
param.label: Chat System
param.description: Choose one of the supported Chat systems from the list

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: displayusers
param.label: Display Users
param.description: Choose how you want to display users
